name: Virus (itch) (bronydell)
description:
Stanley Parable like game where you have to solve all puzzles given by Narrator(aka. Virus) in order to update and play Half Life 3, but you're limited in space on your HDD.

In every puzzle you have to find right file and delete it in order to clean space on HDD.
